sent.orig: Affair of canning not do and also is, the confusion says, will corrupt.
sent.trans: 做不到的事情，也是，乱去说，就会败坏。

sent.orig: Even very small performance deficits during a voice conversation can lead to irritation and confusion.
sent.trans: 在通话过程中甚至很小的性能欠缺都会导致不舒服或者搞糊涂。

sent.orig: The confusion caused by the traffic order is inefficient because of traffic.
sent.trans: 这些混乱的交通秩序是造成交通效率低下的原因。

sent.orig: Perfection of means and confusion of goals seem to characterize our age.
sent.trans: 完美的工具和混淆的目标，似乎是我们这一世代的特点。

sent.orig: My mood is in confusion all thing are in disorder, and can't work well.
sent.trans: 现在的心情很乱，没有什么头绪，工作也没有状态。
